descriptionHtml:
[size=3][img]http://www.mygoodeyenyc.com/modImages/skyrim_Warzones/Logo_Square.png[/img][/size]
[size=3][img]http://www.mygoodeyenyc.com/modImages/skyrim_Warzones/WARZONES---Small-Ads02.jpg[/img][/size]

[size=3]For all this in-game discussion of 'WAR'...
[/size]
[size=3]...there wasn't that much 'WAR' in SKYRIM, was there?[/size]

[size=3]Now there is.[/size]

[size=3]This mod does what it says... It adds EPIC battles, ambushes, encounters and skirmishes throughout SKYRIM![/size]

[size=3]While exploring the SKYRIM, you will come upon battles containing many, many NPCs spanning many, many acres of in-game ground.  Many of which are randomized.  In the course of normal play, you'll never see every WZ![/size]

[size=3]At last count, well, it's impossible to count the amount of NEW, ANGRY NPCS spanning hundreds of DYNAMIC WARZONES![/size]
[size=3][img]http://www.mygoodeyenyc.com/modImages/skyrim_Warzones/WARZONES_subs_divider.png[/img][/size]
[color=#ffd966][size=4][b]REBORN : Presenting WARZONES 2015[/b][/size][/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9494/?][size=3]WARZONES 2015[/size][/url][size=3] has been completely rewritten from the ground up using the latest tools (many of which were not available the first time around).[/size]

[size=3]I’ve added a TON of stuff to the latest version… not the least of which is a team of talented modders to help refine, repair and create the finest mod we can.[/size]

[size=3]Round of applause for Grand Bulwark, Deapri and Tony971![/size]

[size=3]Give a look at the biggest addition to [/size][url=http://mygoodeyenyc.com/WarzonesCivilUnrest/the-warzones-armory/][size=3]WZ15 : The WARZONES ARMORY. [/size][/url][size=3] It adds 100s of Weapons and Armor to WARZONES NPCs.  As well as allowing you to craft them![/size]

[size=3]A huge overhaul of the [/size][url=http://mygoodeyenyc.com/WarzonesCivilUnrest/random-encounters-always-evolving-world/][size=3]RANDOM ENCOUNTER[/size][/url][size=3] system now includes DAY/NIGHT Awareness (no more Werewolves during the day), a deeper RANDOM AMBUSH system and huge new RANDOM WARZONES for a constantly changing Skyrim.[/size]

[size=3]CIVIL WAR FORT SIEGES are bigger than ever!  With more [/size][url=http://mygoodeyenyc.com/WarzonesCivilUnrest/dynamic-warzones/][size=3]DYNAMIC WARZONES & SKIRMISHES[/size][/url][size=3] added to make travel in Skyrim more dangerous than ever![/size]

[size=3]We’re happy to report that the [/size][url=http://mygoodeyenyc.com/WarzonesCivilUnrest/mcm-replaces-the-god-of-warzones/][size=3]GOD OF WARZONES has been executed and replaced by an MCM[/size][/url][size=3] (Mod Configuration Menu) which will allow you to very easily set all WARZONES options without ever having to enter a console command.[/size]

[size=3]The Artificial Intelligence of all NPCs has been redone.  Now, some will fight, some will cower, some will threaten and some will come straight at you like a bat out of hell.[/size]

[size=3]The [/size][url=http://mygoodeyenyc.com/WarzonesCivilUnrest/spawn-o-meter-adjust-spawncount-in-game/][size=3]SPAWN-O-METER[/size][/url][size=3] has undergone a renovation so you can control how many NPCs are spawned!  [/size]

[size=3]An entirely rebuilt [/size][url=http://mygoodeyenyc.com/WarzonesCivilUnrest/mcm-replaces-the-god-of-warzones/][size=3]PAPYRUS DEBUG LOG[/size] [/url][size=3]system has been incorporated for those of you who read your logs – and to help us help you troubleshoot!  Far more information about what’s happening behind the scenes with Warzones is available to you, and you can control the level of detail offered via the MCM.[/size]

[size=3]We have exhaustively tested it for stability, renovated the scripts, removed the “problems” and are now proud as heck to offer WARZONES 2015 to you![/size]

[size=3]Enjoy.[/size]

[size=3]David (MyGoodEye)[/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9494/?]
[color=#ffd966][size=4][b]2015: WHY NOW?  AND WHAT'S WRONG WITH WZv5B?[/b][/size][/color]
[/url]
[color=#ffe599][size=3][b]THE RETURN :[/b][/size][/color]

[size=3]My thinking on “my return” was simple, really: I don’t like leaving things unfinished.[/size]

[size=3]I was very aware that I had left my Skryim mods before:[/size]
[list][*][size=3]Bethesda actually finished the game[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]“Cleaning” tools like TESVEDIT and WRYE BASH were released[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]MCM was available[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Memory Management for Skyrim was understood[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]All the official DLCs were out.[/size][/*]
[/list]
[size=3]It bummed me out a bit because I’d spent many hours making the mods and I was proud of them – so in the back of my mind, I always figured I’d get back around to them and fix ‘em up… but real-life responsibilities have to take priority…[/size]

[size=3]About 5 months ago, I had nothing to do for a day or so, so I dug around the [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/?][size=3]Nexus[/size][/url][size=3]. I was mindful that I had left the mods unfinished and figured I could do a quick update/clean and wrap them up.[/size]

[size=3]I came across [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32363/?][size=3]Grand Bulwark’s page on which he had WZ listed in the “blacklist”[/size][/url][size=3]… so I wrote him a note which said, in a nutshell:[/size]

[size=3]“Put up or shut up.”[/size]

[size=3]More precisely, I invited him to explain – exactly – what the trouble with WZv5B was, how it could be fixed (now with the benefit of 2 years advances in Skyrim tech) and if he was using the buzz-terms “dirty edits”, “bloated save” and whatever other ones properly or if he was just vomiting back what he’d “heard” and perpetuating the rumor-mill.[/size]

[size=3]Turns out, he opted to “put up” and now we’re buddies.  Grand Bulwark recruited our team and with our combined knowledge and efforts, we have rebuilt WARZONES.[/size]

[size=3]Had I not found a collaborator as interested in collaboration as he was, I would have just run WZ through TESVEDIT, removed the helper and been done with it. But he was excited to repair and expand WZ… and here we are.[/size]
[size=3] [/size]
[color=#ffe599][size=3][b]WZv5B : THE PROBLEMS AND MY MOOD AT THE TIME :[/b][/size][/color]

[size=3]WZv5B worked for a load of people.  There were stalwart defenders of the mod here in the comments for years after I "left" all of which would say "it works if you do a, b and c".  And, obviously, there were the detractors that, for whatever reasons legitimately had problems with WZv5B.  Honestly, I expect some of that to happen again.[/size]

[size=3]I’m not saying that WZv5B wasn’t flawed – in fact, it was “unclean” because TESVEDIT wasn’t available at the time to clean the mod…  WZv5B wasn’t updated to the final version of the game – because the game wasn’t “final”…[/size]

[size=3]When we decided to revisit it, we found that there really was only one major problem and that was the Helper ([url=http://mygoodeyenyc.com/WarzonesCivilUnrest/mcm-replaces-the-god-of-warzones/]The God of Warzones[/url]).[/size]

[size=3]There were other bits of sloppiness that became evident as I deconstructed what I’d done.  It was obvious that there were some “growing pains” left within the mod (y’know, a variety of methods to do the same thing as I’d developed and learned)…[/size]

[size=3]… the scripts were tight (improved now with more fail-safes) and the framework was overall fine… but that it was a HUGE mod – and most users are ignorant of how resources are used – I found myself in a defensive position…[/size]

[size=3]… and being in a defensive position on a hobby is hardly worth the energy. I became disinterested in helping those that refused to help themselves. And REALLY tired of explaining the notion that a 32-bit game engine (pre ENBBOOST and SKSE memory hacks) has limitations… like a cup, you can only fill it so much before it spills over…[/size]
[size=3] [/size]
[size=3]…AND NOW :WZv5B wasn’t as f*cked as its reputation, but with the help of Deapri, Grand Bulwark and Tony971, I’ve rescripted most of it, killed the “helper”, added an MCM, added TONS more dynamic WZs, random WZs, daytime WZs, nighttime WZs, WZs that only show up every now and again, so on so forth.  Many of the “original WZs” remain, but are now more randomized making it not “always on”.  It’s really pretty exciting…[/size]

[size=3]- David (MyGoodEye)[/size]
[img]http://www.mygoodeyenyc.com/modImages/skyrim_Warzones/WARZONES_subs_divider4.png[/img]
[color=#ffd966][size=4][b]INSTALLATION DOCUMENTATION:[/b][/size][/color]

[size=3]You may have noticed that the page is full of links... Rather that fill this page up to the character limit or provide you with a 26 page Word document (that very few of you read, I bet), I've created a standalone documentation website that I will refer to (and update) regularly. [/size]

[size=3][url=http://mygoodeyenyc.com/WarzonesCivilUnrest/]The complete ONLINE DOCUMENTATION can be found here.  I encourage you to read it.[/url]  WARZONES is a big mod with many options and can be impacted by many things, so by saying "encourage", I guess I'm being polite.[/size]

[size=3]Since I suspect many of you won't have the time or inclination to read it in its entirety, here is a list of subjects with direct links.[/size]

[url=http://mygoodeyenyc.com/WarzonesCivilUnrest/page-people-suck/]PEOPLE SUCK : An Introduction to WARZONES[/url]

[size=3]Help us to help you by reading before asking... [/size]

[size=3]If you find errors/omissions in the documentation, please feel free to let me know.[/size]

[color=#ffd966][size=4][b]COMMENTS & ENDORSEMENTS: [/b][/size][/color]

[size=3]I love 'em! [/size]

[size=3]If you have constructive criticism or an idea you'd like to see implemented, PLEASE let me know... if you're just going to whine, save it for your Mommy. [/size]

[size=3]Any REQUESTS? Leave 'em in the COMMENTS section!!![/size]

[size=3]- David[/size]

[size=3]Please make any suggestions either in the COMMENT thread (so others can chime in) or PM me.[/size]

[img]http://www.mygoodeyenyc.com/modImages/skyrim_Warzones/nexusexclusive.png[/img]

[size=3]CLARALUX is next on my list of UPDATES... coming soon!  But if you're going to use it, use V2.  If you'd like to test CLARALUX 2015 BETA, let me know via PM.[/size]
